trans-unit.source: Contains arguments relevant to all drag-and-drop events (<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter>, <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave>, <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver>, and <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop>).
trans-unit.target: 包含与所有拖放事件相关的自变量 (<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter>， <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave>， <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver>，和<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop>)。</xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.Drop> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragOver> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragLeave> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DragEnter>

trans-unit.source: Gets a member of the <xref href="System.Windows.DragDropEffects"></xref> enumeration that specifies which operations are allowed by the originator of the drag event.
trans-unit.target: 获取的成员<xref href="System.Windows.DragDropEffects"></xref>枚举，它指定所允许的拖动事件的发起方的操作。

trans-unit.source: When a drag-and-drop operation is initiated by calling the <xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A> method, permissible operations are specified with a member of the <xref:System.Windows.DragDropEffects> enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 当通过调用来启动拖放操作是<xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A>方法，允许的操作指定的成员<xref:System.Windows.DragDropEffects>枚举。</xref:System.Windows.DragDropEffects> </xref:System.Windows.DragDrop.DoDragDrop%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, when dragging a read-only file the drag initiator should indicate that the file can be copied, but not moved.
trans-unit.target: 例如，拖动只读文件时，拖动发起方应该指示可以复制，但不是会移动该文件。

trans-unit.source: Before attempting to perform an operation on dragged data, examine this property to ensure that the operation is allowed.
trans-unit.target: 然后再尝试对拖动的数据执行操作，检查此属性以确保允许此操作。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.DragDropEffects"></xref> enumeration that specifies which operations are allowed by the originator of the drag event.
trans-unit.target: 成员<xref href="System.Windows.DragDropEffects"></xref>枚举，它指定所允许的拖动事件的发起方的操作。

trans-unit.source: Gets a data object that contains the data associated with the corresponding drag event.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个包含与相应的拖动事件关联的数据的数据对象。

trans-unit.source: A data object that contains the data associated with the corresponding drag event..
trans-unit.target: 一个包含与相应的拖动事件关联的数据的数据对象...

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the target drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置目标拖放操作。

trans-unit.source: By default, the effect specified in this property determines the mouse cursor for the target of a drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，此属性中指定的影响确定拖放操作的目标的鼠标光标。

trans-unit.source: This is useful to provide feedback to the user on the operation that will occur when the corresponding object is dropped.
trans-unit.target: 这可用于向上删除相应的对象时，将发生的操作的用户提供反馈。

trans-unit.source: A member of the <xref href="System.Windows.DragDropEffects"></xref> enumeration specifying the target drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 成员<xref href="System.Windows.DragDropEffects"></xref>指定目标拖放操作的枚举。

trans-unit.source: Returns a drop point that is relative to a specified <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回与指定相对的放置点<xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"></xref> object for which to get a relative drop point.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.IInputElement"> </xref>要为其获取相对放置点的对象。

trans-unit.source: A drop point that is relative to the element specified in relativeTo.
trans-unit.target: 相对于中指定的元素的拖动点 relativeTo 。

trans-unit.source: Raised when relativeTo is **null**.
trans-unit.target: Raised when relativeTo is **null**.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets a flag enumeration indicating the current state of the SHIFT, CTRL, and ALT keys, as well as the state of the mouse buttons.
trans-unit.target: 获取标志枚举，该值指示 SHIFT、 CTRL 和 ALT 键的当前状态以及鼠标按钮的状态。

trans-unit.source: The effect of a drag-and-drop operation can be adjusted depending on the state of a particular key.
trans-unit.target: 根据特定密钥的状态，可以调整拖放操作的效果。

trans-unit.source: For example, data may either be copied or moved depending on whether the CTRL or SHIFT keys are pressed during the drag-and-drop operation.
trans-unit.target: 例如，数据可能是要复制或移动具体取决于是否在拖放操作期间按住 CTRL 或 SHIFT 键。

trans-unit.source: One or more members of the <xref href="System.Windows.DragDropKeyStates"></xref> flag enumeration.
trans-unit.target: 一个或多个成员<xref href="System.Windows.DragDropKeyStates"></xref>标志枚举。
